评论概述: Not as Cute or Comfortable as Expected
评论详情: I really wanted to like the PRETTYGARDEN Women's Chunky Knit Open Front Sweater, but it didn’t quite live up to my expectations.  First, the fit was a bit off. The cardigan is described as loose and relaxed, but it ended up being too boxy and unflattering on me. The sleeves felt a little too wide and long, and the overall shape made me look frumpy rather than stylish. I was hoping for something more chic and comfy for layering, but this just didn’t work for my body type.  The material is also a letdown. While it’s marketed as chunky knit, the fabric feels surprisingly thin and not as warm as I expected. The knit is loosely woven, and after a few wears, it started to stretch out and lose its shape. It wasn’t as cozy as I thought it would be, especially for fall and winter wear.  Additionally, the buttons felt flimsy and didn’t seem to hold up well after a few uses. I noticed them loosening, which was disappointing considering how expensive it was.  Overall, this cardigan didn’t meet my expectations for both comfort and style. It may work for someone else, but I won’t be reaching for it again anytime soon. There are definitely better options for a cozy, flattering cardigan out there.

The first thing I noticed was the sweater smells super bad when I pulled it out of the wrapper. So I washed it and that did help. But overall the sweater is not very soft so I probably won't be wearing it much! :-(
This is a cute, lightweight, comfortable cardigan. True to size. A little more cropped than it looks in the pictures.  Worth the buy.
True to size, very comfortable. Just don’t place it in the dryer

评论概述: Warm, Cozy, Comfy, and Super Cute!
评论详情: I literally cannot stop buying these sweater cardigans. They are PERFECT! I am a size small and they fit really well. They are not too big nor are they snug or tight. I say 'they' because I have 4 so far and I am on my way to purchasing more in other colors. I can create the cutest outfits with these sweaters, which I have and worn them to work, an outside event, and even at home! I have also fallen asleep wearing them and they are extremely cozy, comfy, and they keep me warm. When I purchased these, it was during summer, which my work's building can get quite chilly. I am now excited for the holidays, which I now get to style for. I cannot stop wearing them and I will never regret this purchase. If you do decide to purchase these sweater cardigans, make sure to take really good care of them through wash cycles. They are strong and sturdy but I recommend a very safe and delicate fabric softener too soften them up a bit through drying as I have ran mine through the wash more than a dozen times (still in perfect shape and condition) but got a little stiff. Other than that, this was a wonderful purchase!

评论概述: I have in so many colors!
评论详情: These sweaters are amazing. I have had several people ask me where I purchased. When it first arrives, just wash it as it doesn't feel great coming out of the bag. Once washed though, it is perfection!! I wear all the time.

For reference, I am 5'5 and weigh 130 The PRETTY GARDEN Women's Chunky Knit Open Front Sweater is a stylish and versatile addition to any wardrobe. With its cozy knit fabric, this cardigan provides warmth without sacrificing style. The open front design and long sleeves make it easy to layer over various outfits, while the loose fit ensures comfort throughout the day. The button details add a charming touch, making it suitable for casual and slightly dressier occasions. Available in a range of colors, this cardigan can easily complement any ensemble. It's an excellent choice for those looking to stay fashionable and comfortable during the cooler months.
